Posts.Content: May 21, 2009 05:35AM scontor wrote: Hi, I am a new male member on this site looking for information on my wife's condition.  I had a very painful lump in my armpit when I was in my mid-20s.  I was concerned it might be something serious like Hodgkins lymphoma.  It turns out the staph infection I had previously developed from an innocuous-looking scratch on my thumb wasn't responding to the antibiotic I was taking, and I had a swollen lymph node in response. I guess my point is lumps in that area can have various causes, but having a doctor look at it is definitely the way to go.
Posts.Title: Underarm Lump Lydzzz scontor
